description.english: Instakill someone with full health in Perfect Warrior game.
Win the Sprint game while the other 11 players lie on the ground.
Train in someone's stream with over 50 viewers in the room.
Win a match playing as viewer against at least 9 other players in the Blade game without moving.
Train as a subscriber with 10 other subs on someone's stream.
Be the only survivor of the pandemic in the Quarantine game having started at least 16 players.
Be forgived at least 3 times in the Werewolf game having started at least 10 players and without forcing any choice as streamer.
Play as Viewer the Royal invitation game with at least 29 other players and win as a guest by taking more than 10 minutes to make the first decision.
Survive 5 consecutive days by sleeping outside in the Quarantine game without showing any symptoms.
Win a match against 99 other players in the Blade game.
Grow at least 30 plants in the Garden Invasion game with a minimum of 10 players at startpoint.
Train as a viewer and earn 300 experience in a single session.
Survive until round 10 without being hit in the Blade game.
Win the Werewolf game being one of them who has not killed any innocent villager during the night in a game of at least 10 players and without streamer forcing any choice.
Win the Rondo game after passing the ball to 10 different players.
Pass the ball 3 times with your stamina below 20% in a single Rondo game.
Win the Werewolf game without executing any inocent villager having started at least 16 players and without streamer forcing any choice.
Play as Viewer the Royal invitation game with at least 29 other players and win after sneaking in twice without being the real guest.
Play as Viewer the Royal invitation game with at least 29 other players and win by being the killer.
Win in the Sprint game after kicking 11 different players at least once.
Defeat 40 opponents in a row in Perfect Warrior game.
Win the Sprint game in under 55 seconds against 11 other players.
90% of villagers must survive the pandemic in the Quarantine game with a minimum of 10 players.
Win 5 fights in a row without healing in Perfect Warrior game.
Win the Rondo game without your stamina has dropped below 80%.
Lock the streamer in the Garden Invasion game with half the map without plants being at least 10 players at startpoint.
Win after kicking 20 players in a Sprint game against 11 other viewers.
Pass the ball 5 times in a row to the same player in the Rondo game as long as more than two players remain.
Win the Werewolf game with more werewolves alive than those who started the game and without streamer forcing any choice.
Win the Werewolf game as a werewolf without any of you being executed having started at least 16 players and without streamer forcing any choice.
Survive 7 days in the Werewolf game forest as villager and without streamer forcing any choice.
Play as Viewer the Royal invitation game with at least 29 other players and win as a guest in less than 2 minutes.
Win against at least 5 other players in the Sprint game, having kicked the same player 10 times.
Pass the ball one time in the Rondo game with your stamina below 5%.
Have 3 maxed stats simultaneously in Perfect Warrior game.
Defeat the streamer in the Garden Invasion game being the last player standing at the end of the match, having started at least 10 players at startpoint.
Win a match against 99 bots in the Blade game being logged in offline mode.
Recover from the virus after being patient zero in the Quarantine game.
Despite having symptoms, sleep outside so that someone gets cured in the Quarantine game.
Recover twice from the virus in the same Quarantine game.
Play two different Christmas days from December 21 to 31th.
Play one Christmas day from December 21 to 31th.
Invoke the demon of the Dark rite game without moving against, at least, other 19 players.
Participate in every ritual pools of the Dark rite game before winning a game with more than 20 players.
Invoke the demon of the Dark rite game with all the 40 players imbued with darkness.
Invoke the demon of the Dark rite game with only 6 players imbued with darkness having started at least 20 participants.
Invoke the demon of the Dark rite game being the last one converted in a match with at least 30 players.
Interrupt a ritual in every pool of the Dark rite game before winning in a game with more than 20 players.
Win as sniper in the Sniper game with the timer starting at 30s. This time depends on your previous victories and defeats.
Win as sniper in the Sniper game always using the same sensor.
Escape as a target in the Sniper game when time runs out.
Survive as target in the Sniper game by making the streamer shoot an innocent within 2 meters of you.
Win as sniper in the Sniper game using the scope for a total of 5 seconds maximum.
Win as sniper in theSniper game by shooting all targets in the last second.
Die as innocent by the sniper in the Sniper game for being in the same area as the target.
Get all stats at minimum simultaneously in Perfect warrior game.
Beat all rounds of Stampede control game playing alone.
Run to extend for 30 extra seconds a round of Stampede control game with a minimum of 10 players in the beginning.
Answer correctly first in all rounds of Stampede control game with a minimum of 10 players in the beginning.
Predict a Stampede control game round in the first 10 seconds after starting to run with a minimum of 10 players in the beginning.
Kill 3 players with a single arrow trap in Pharaoh’s chamber game.
Kill 5 players with a single trap in Pharaoh’s chamber game.
Reveal 10 safe slabs without dying in Pharaoh’s chamber game.
Kill someone about to reach the goal with a trap triggered by you in Pharaoh’s chamber game.
Enter the Pharaoh’s chamber game trap zone in the first 10 seconds and win without dying.
Defeat the Dungeon raid game boss on your own.
Get the kill of the two bosses in Dungeon raid game.
Get the kill of 3 enemies of the same type in Dungeon raid game.
Get the kill of 4 different enemy types in Dungeon raid game.
Get the kill of 5 different enemies in Dungeon raid game.
Win without fighting in a full Dungeon raid game.
Play on Halloween day.
Shoot 50 runners in a row in 1,2,3... Stop! game.
Shoot all 250 players in 1,2,3... Stop! game.
Survive as runner other’s streamer a massacre of more than 100 runners without bots in 1,2,3... Stop! game.
Lose as runner in other’s stream 1,2,3... Stop! game within 1 meter of the finish line in a game with at least 30 initial players and no bots.
Reach the goal in other’s stream 1,2,3... Stop! game without ever being seen moving with at least 30 initial players and no bots.
Reach the goal as runner in other’s stream 1,2,3... Stop! game last second when the streamer is no looking with at least 30 initial players and no bots.
Win as runner in other’s stream 1,2,3... Stop! game full of players and no bots.
Beat the fifth round of Colorblind floor game playing alone without bots.
Win a game of 30 or more players with the accessibility mode of Colorblind floor game enabled.
Win a game of Colorblind floor game against the maximum number of players.
Run across the laser while passing the safe zone playing Colorblind floor game in another stream.
Tie after leaving in the last round of Colorblind floor game with 4 other players.
Win a game of Colorblind floor game with 30 or more players before reaching the fourth round.
Beat all 5 rounds of Colorblind floor game in another stream by choosing your answers in less than 10 seconds.
